boostr 0.1.0
  • Reference

Estimate antibody titres

ab.Rd

Estimate antibody titres

Usage

ab(
  timesteps,
  dose_timesteps,
  init_titres,
  prop_short,
  dur_short,
  dur_long,
  cpp = TRUE
)

Arguments

timesteps

Number of timesteps to output titres for

dose_timesteps

Timesteps of doses

init_titres

Titres at initital does or subsequent boost times

prop_short

Proportion of the response that is short lived for each dose period

dur_short

Duration of the short-lived response for each dose period

dur_long

Duration of the long-lived response for each dose period

cpp

Use cpp titre model

Value

Vector of antibody tires for 1:timesteps
